text: Streets of Rage is a series of beat 'em ups. It was made and published by Sega for various consoles. == List of video games == * Streets of Rage (1991) * Streets of Rage 2 (1992) * Streets of Rage 3 (1994) * Streets of Rage 4 (2020) == References == * Category:Beat 'em ups Category:Sega beat 'em ups
title: Streets of Rage
